original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o //
translated: I should practice the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyad par bgyi'o //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyad par bgyi'o //
translated: I should practice the right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o //🔽dbang po rnams la spyad par bgyi'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o // dbang po rnams la spyad par bgyi'o //
translated: I should practice the legs of miraculous power.🔽I should practice the faculties.

original: stobs rnams la spyad par bgyi'o //
analyzed: stobs rnams la spyad par bgyi'o //
translated: I should practice the powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyad par bgyi'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyad par bgyi'o //
translated: I should practice the branches of awakening.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyad par bgyi'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyad par bgyi'o //
translated: I should practice the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o //
translated: I should practice the noble truths.

original: bsam gtan rnams la spyad par bgyi'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams la spyad par bgyi'o //
translated: I should practice the meditative stabilizations.

original: tshad med pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o //
translated: I should practice the immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o //
translated: I should practice the formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o //
translated: I should practice the liberations.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o //
translated: I should practice the serial absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyad par bgyi'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyad par bgyi'o //
translated: I should practice the emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o //
translated: I should practice the superknowledges.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyad par bgyi'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyad par bgyi'o //
translated: I should practice the meditative stabilizations.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyad par bgyi'o //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyad par bgyi'o //
translated: I should practice the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyad par bgyi'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyad par bgyi'o //
translated: I should practice the powers of the tathāgatas.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o //
translated: I should practice fearlessness.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyad @54b par bgyi'o //🔽byams pa chen po la spyad par bgyi'o //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyad @54b par bgyi'o // byams pa chen po la spyad par bgyi'o //
translated: I should practice the correct understandings.🔽I should practice great love.

original: snying rje chen po la spyad par bgyi'o //
analyzed: snying rje chen po la spyad par bgyi'o //
translated: I should practice great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o //🔽rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyad par bgyi'o //🔽lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyad par bgyi'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o // rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyad par bgyi'o // lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyad par bgyi'o //
translated: I should practice the distinct attributes of the buddhas.🔽I should practice the result of stream enterer.🔽I should practice the result of once-returner.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyad par bgyi'o //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyad par bgyi'o //
translated: I should practice the result of non-returner.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o //
translated: I will practice for the state of a worthy one.

original: rang byang chub la spyad par bgyi'o //
analyzed: rang byang chub la spyad par bgyi'o //
translated: I will practice for a pratyekabuddha’s awakening.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o //
translated: I will practice for the knowledge of path aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o //
translated: I will practice for the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de nas 'dod pa na spyad pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas 'dod pa na spyad pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the gods living in the desire realm and the gods living in the form realm said to the Lord,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord,

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos /
translated: in that way bodhisattva great beings

original: chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyid la /
analyzed: chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyid la /
translated: fully awaken to all dharmas,

original: chos de dag kyang ma mchis shing mi dmigs pas /
analyzed: chos de dag kyang ma mchis shing mi dmigs pas /
translated: but those dharmas do not exist and are not apprehended.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni 'byung bar dka'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni 'byung bar dka'o //
translated: It is hard to find unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: lha'i bu dag /🔽de de bzhin no //
analyzed: lha'i bu dag / de de bzhin no //
translated: “Gods,🔽it is just so,

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: just as it is.

original: lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag /
translated: Gods,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni 'byung bar dka'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni 'byung bar dka'o //
translated: “Anuttarā samyak-saṃbodhi is difficult to attain.

original: lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag /
translated: Devaputras,

original: ngas kyang chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
analyzed: ngas kyang chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
translated: I have fully awakened to all dharmas in all aspects.

original: don dam par na gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'am /
analyzed: don dam par na gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'am /
translated: Ultimately, I do not apprehend any dharma that fully awakens,

original: gang gis @55a *//
analyzed: gang gis @55a *//
translated: or by which🔽one fully awakens,

original: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'am /🔽gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i chos gang yang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'am / gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i chos gang yang mi dmigs so //
translated: or to which one fully awakens.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: lha'i bu dag; chos thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lha'i bu dag; chos thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Devaputras, it is because all dharmas are utterly pure.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis /
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis /
translated: Then the venerable Subhūti

original: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: said to the Bhagavān,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni 'byung bar dka'o zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni 'byung bar dka'o zhes gsungs pa /
translated: “Bhagavān, you have said, ‘Anuttarā samyak-saṃbodhi is difficult to attain.’

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba dang / bdag sems pa ltar na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba dang / bdag sems pa ltar na /
translated: As I understand the meaning of what the Lord has said, and as I consider it,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Lord,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba ni mi dka'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba ni mi dka'o //
translated: it is not difficult to fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽de ni 'di ltar gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / de ni 'di ltar gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis /
translated: Lord,🔽it is because there is no one who fully awakens,

original: gang gis kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis /
analyzed: gang gis kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis /
translated: there is nothing by which one fully awakens,

original: gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'ang ma mchis te /
analyzed: gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'ang ma mchis te /
translated: and there is nothing that one fully awakens to.

original: chos thams cad ni stong pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad ni stong pa'o //
translated: All phenomena are empty.

original: chos thams cad stong pa la ni gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'i chos de lta bu ma mchis so //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa la ni gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'i chos de lta bu ma mchis so //
translated: In the emptiness of all phenomena, there is no dharma that would awaken, by which there would be awakening, or to which there would be awakening.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,🔽it is because all phenomena are empty.🔽There is no dharma that would give,🔽or that would take,

original: de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad @55b ni stong pa ste /🔽chos gang yang 'phel bar bgyi ba'i slad du'am /🔽yongs su 'grib par bgyi ba'i slad du sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'am /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad @55b ni stong pa ste / chos gang yang 'phel bar bgyi ba'i slad du'am / yongs su 'grib par bgyi ba'i slad du sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'am /
translated: or that would give up,

original: tshul khrims srung ba'am /🔽bzod pa bsgom pa'am /
analyzed: tshul khrims srung ba'am / bzod pa bsgom pa'am /
translated: or that would guard,🔽or that would cultivate,

original: brtson 'grus rtsom pa'am /
analyzed: brtson 'grus rtsom pa'am /
translated: or that would exert itself,

original: bsam gtan la mnyam par bzhag pa'am /
analyzed: bsam gtan la mnyam par bzhag pa'am /
translated: or that would become absorbed,

original: shes rab bsgom pa'am /🔽nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am /
analyzed: shes rab bsgom pa'am / nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am /
translated: or that would cultivate wisdom,🔽or that would cultivate inner emptiness,🔽or that would cultivate outer emptiness,

original: phyi stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am /
translated: or that would cultivate inner and outer emptiness,🔽or that would cultivate the emptiness of emptiness,🔽or that would cultivate great emptiness,🔽or that would cultivate the emptiness of ultimate reality,🔽or that would cultivate the emptiness of the compounded,🔽or that would cultivate the emptiness of the uncompounded,🔽or that would cultivate the emptiness of the limitless,🔽or that would cultivate the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end,🔽or that would cultivate the emptiness of non-dispersal,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am /
translated: or that would cultivate the emptiness of inherent existence,🔽or that would cultivate the emptiness of all things,🔽or that would cultivate the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics,🔽or that would cultivate the emptiness of non-apprehension,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am /
translated: or that would cultivate the emptiness of non-dispersal,🔽or that would cultivate the emptiness of essential nature,🔽or that would cultivate the emptiness of essential nature of non-entities.

original: chen po stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am /
translated: the meditation on the emptiness of the great,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am /🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am / 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am /
translated: the meditation on the emptiness of the ultimate,🔽the meditation on the emptiness of the compounded,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am /🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am /🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am /
translated: the meditation on the emptiness of the uncompounded,🔽the meditation on the emptiness of what is beyond extremes,🔽the meditation on the emptiness of what is without beginning or end,

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am /
translated: the meditation on the emptiness of what is not to be discarded,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am /
translated: the meditation on the emptiness of inherent existence,

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am /
translated: the meditation on the emptiness of all things,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am /🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am /
translated: the meditation on the emptiness of its own mark,🔽the meditation on the emptiness of non-apprehension,

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am /🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am /
translated: the meditation on the emptiness of non-entity,🔽the meditation on the emptiness of own-being,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am /
translated: the meditation on the emptiness of the non-existence of own-being,

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bsgom pa'am /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bsgom pa'am /
translated: the meditation on the applications of mindfulness,

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams bsgom pa'am /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams bsgom pa'am /
translated: the meditation on the right efforts,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsgom pa'am /🔽dbang po rnams bsgom pa'am /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsgom pa'am / dbang po rnams bsgom pa'am /
translated: the bases of supernatural powers,🔽the powers,

original: stobs rnams bsgom pa'am /🔽byang chub @56a *//
analyzed: stobs rnams bsgom pa'am / byang chub @56a *//
translated: the strengths,

original: kyi yan lag rnams bsgom pa'am /
analyzed: kyi yan lag rnams bsgom pa'am /
translated: the aspects of awakening,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa'am /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa'am /
translated: the noble eightfold path,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsgom pa'am /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsgom pa'am /
translated: the noble truths,

original: bsam gtan rnams bsgom pa'am /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams bsgom pa'am /
translated: the meditative stabilities,

original: tshad med pa rnams bsgom pa'am /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams bsgom pa'am /
translated: the immeasurables,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom pa'am /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom pa'am /
translated: the formless meditative stabilizations,

original: rnam par thar pa rnams bsgom pa'am /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams bsgom pa'am /
translated: the liberations,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom pa'am /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom pa'am /
translated: the serial absorptions,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bsgom pa 'am /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bsgom pa 'am /
translated: the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gateways to liberation,

original: mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom pa'am /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom pa'am /
translated: the clairvoyances,

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom pa'am /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom pa'am /
translated: the meditative stabilities,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom pa'am /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom pa'am /
translated: the dhāraṇī gateways,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bsgom pa'am /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bsgom pa'am /
translated: the powers of the tathāgatas,

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams bsgom pa'am /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams bsgom pa'am /
translated: “It is not the meditation on the fearlessnesses,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsgom pa'am /🔽byams pa chen po bsgom pa'am /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsgom pa'am / byams pa chen po bsgom pa'am /
translated: the meditation on the detailed and thorough knowledges,🔽the meditation on great love,

original: snying rje chen po bsgom pa'am /
analyzed: snying rje chen po bsgom pa'am /
translated: the meditation on great compassion,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom pa'am /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom pa'am /
translated: the meditation on the distinct attributes of the buddhas,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa'am /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa'am /
translated: the meditation on the result of stream enterer,

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa 'am /
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa 'am /
translated: the meditation on the result of once-returner,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa'am /🔽dgra bcom pa nyid bsgom pa'am /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa'am / dgra bcom pa nyid bsgom pa'am /
translated: the meditation on the result of non-returner,🔽the meditation on the state of a worthy one,

original: rang byang chub bsgom pa'am /
analyzed: rang byang chub bsgom pa'am /
translated: the meditation on a pratyekabuddha’s awakening,

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgom pa'am /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgom pa'am /
translated: the meditation on the knowledge of path aspects,🔽or the meditation on the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi don du @56b bslab pa'i chos de dag kyang ma mchis pa ste /🔽gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'am /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi don du @56b bslab pa'i chos de dag kyang ma mchis pa ste / gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'am /
translated: Those dharmas on which one should train for the sake of the knowledge of all aspects do not exist.🔽There is no one who fully awakens

original: gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'am /
analyzed: gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'am /
translated: or anything by which there is full awakening.

original: gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang stong pa ste /
analyzed: gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang stong pa ste /
translated: All those dharmas which are fully awakened to are empty.

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na /
translated: For this reason, Blessed One,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos /
translated: it is easy for bodhisattva great beings

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar sla'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar sla'o //
translated: to fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de ni 'di ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //🔽tshor ba ni tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // tshor ba ni tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: it is because form is empty of the intrinsic nature of form,🔽feeling is empty of the intrinsic nature of feeling,

original: 'du shes ni 'du shes kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: 'du shes ni 'du shes kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: perception is empty of the intrinsic nature of perception,

original: 'du byed ni 'du byed kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: 'du byed ni 'du byed kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: volitional factors are empty of the intrinsic nature of volitional factors,

original: rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //🔽mig ni mig gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // mig ni mig gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: and consciousness is empty of the intrinsic nature of consciousness.🔽The eyes are empty of the intrinsic nature of the eyes,

original: rna ba ni rna ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rna ba ni rna ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: the ears are empty of the intrinsic nature of the ears,

original: sna ni sna'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: sna ni sna'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The nose is empty of the intrinsic nature of the nose.

original: lce ni lce'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: lce ni lce'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The tongue is empty of the intrinsic nature of the tongue.

original: lus ni lus kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: lus ni lus kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The body is empty of the intrinsic nature of the body.

original: yid ni yid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: yid ni yid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The mind is empty of the intrinsic nature of the mind.

original: gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: Form is empty of the intrinsic nature of form.

original: sgra ni sgra'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //🔽dri ni dri'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: sgra ni sgra'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // dri ni dri'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: Sound is empty of the intrinsic nature of sound.🔽Smell is empty of the intrinsic nature of smell.

original: ro ni ro'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: ro ni ro'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: Taste is empty of the intrinsic nature of taste.

original: reg ni reg gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: reg ni reg gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: Tactile objects are empty of the intrinsic nature of tactile objects.

original: chos ni chos kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //🔽mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //🔽rna @57a *// ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: chos ni chos kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rna @57a *// ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: Mental phenomena are empty of the intrinsic nature of mental phenomena.🔽The eye consciousness is empty of the intrinsic nature of the eye consciousness.🔽The ear consciousness is empty of the intrinsic nature of the ear consciousness.

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The nose consciousness is empty of the intrinsic nature of the nose consciousness.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The tongue consciousness is empty of the intrinsic nature of the tongue consciousness.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The body consciousness is empty of the intrinsic nature of the body consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The mind consciousness is empty of the intrinsic nature of the mind consciousness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: Eye contact is empty of the intrinsic nature of eye contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: Ear contact is empty of the intrinsic nature of ear contact.🔽Nose contact is empty of the intrinsic nature of nose contact.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: Tongue contact is empty of the intrinsic nature of tongue contact.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: Body contact is empty of the intrinsic nature of body contact.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: Mental contact is empty of mental contact.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: Feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact is empty of feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: Feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact is empty of feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact.🔽Feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact is empty of feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact.🔽Feeling that arises from the condition of tongue contact is empty of feeling that arises from the condition of tongue contact.

original: @57b lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: @57b lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: Feeling that arises from the condition of body contact is empty of feeling that arises from the condition of body contact.🔽Feeling that arises from the condition of mind contact is empty of feeling that arises from the condition of mind contact.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: Contact at the body sense-sphere that gives rise to feeling is empty of the intrinsic nature of contact at the body sense-sphere that gives rise to feeling.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: Contact at the mind sense-sphere that gives rise to feeling is empty of the intrinsic nature of contact at the mind sense-sphere that gives rise to feeling.

original: sa'i khams ni sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: sa'i khams ni sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The earth element is empty of the intrinsic nature of the earth element.

original: chu'i khams ni chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: chu'i khams ni chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The water element is empty of the intrinsic nature of the water element.

original: me'i khams ni me'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //🔽rlung gi khams ni rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: me'i khams ni me'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rlung gi khams ni rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The fire element is empty of the intrinsic nature of the fire element.🔽The wind element is empty of the intrinsic nature of the wind element.

original: nam mkha'i khams ni nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams ni nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The space element is empty of the intrinsic nature of the space element.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The consciousness element is empty of the intrinsic nature of the consciousness element.

original: ma rig pa ni ma rig pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: ma rig pa ni ma rig pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: ignorance is empty of the nature of ignorance,

original: 'du byed ni 'du byed kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: 'du byed ni 'du byed kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: formations are empty of the nature of formations,

original: rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: consciousness is empty of the nature of consciousness,

original: ming dang gzugs ni ming dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs ni ming dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: name and form are empty of the nature of name and form,

original: skye mched drug ni skye mched drug gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: skye mched drug ni skye mched drug gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: the six sense sources are empty of the nature of the six sense sources,

original: reg pa ni reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: reg pa ni reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: contact is empty of the nature of contact,

original: tshor ba ni tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //🔽sred pa ni sred pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: tshor ba ni tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // sred pa ni sred pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: feeling is empty of the nature of feeling,🔽craving is empty of the nature of craving,

original: len pa ni len pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: len pa ni len pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: grasping is empty of the nature of grasping,

original: srid pa ni srid pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //🔽skye ba ni skye @58a *//
analyzed: srid pa ni srid pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // skye ba ni skye @58a *//
translated: existence is empty of the nature of existence,

original: ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: birth is empty of the nature of birth,

original: rga shi ni rga shi'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rga shi ni rga shi'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: and aging and death are empty of the nature of aging and death.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo; ;tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo; ;tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The perfection of giving is empty of the perfection of giving. The perfection of morality is empty of the perfection of morality.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The perfection of patience is empty of the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The perfection of effort is empty of the perfection of effort.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The perfection of meditation is empty of the perfection of meditation.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is empty of the perfection of wisdom.

original: nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: Inner emptiness is empty of inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: External emptiness is empty of the nature of external emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: Internal and external emptiness is empty of the nature of internal and external emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: Emptiness of emptiness is empty of the nature of emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: Great emptiness is empty of the nature of great emptiness.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: Ultimate emptiness is empty of the nature of ultimate emptiness.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: Conditioned emptiness is empty of the nature of conditioned emptiness.🔽Unconditioned emptiness is empty of the nature of unconditioned emptiness.

original: @58b mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: @58b mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: Emptiness beyond extremes is empty of the nature of emptiness beyond extremes.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of what is beginningless and endless is empty of the nature of the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of non-rejection is empty of the nature of the emptiness of non-rejection.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of nature is empty of the nature of the emptiness of nature.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of all phenomena is empty of the nature of the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of its own mark is empty of the nature of the emptiness of its own mark.🔽The emptiness of non-apprehension is empty of the nature of the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of non-things is empty of the nature of the emptiness of non-things.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is empty of the nature of the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities is empty of the nature of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //🔽yang dag par spong ba rnams ni yang dag par spong ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // yang dag par spong ba rnams ni yang dag par spong ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The applications of mindfulness are empty of the nature of the applications of mindfulness.🔽The right efforts are empty of the nature of the right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //🔽dbang po rnams ni dbang po'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // dbang po rnams ni dbang po'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The legs of manifestation are empty of the nature of the legs of manifestation.🔽The faculties are empty of the nature of the faculties.

original: stobs rnams ni stobs kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //🔽byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni byang @59a *//
analyzed: stobs rnams ni stobs kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni byang @59a *//
translated: The powers are empty of the nature of the powers.

original: chub kyi yan lag gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: chub kyi yan lag gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The branches of enlightenment are empty of the nature of the branches of enlightenment.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The noble path with its eight parts is empty of the nature of the noble path with its eight parts.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The noble truths are empty of the nature of the noble truths.

original: bsam gtan rnams ni bsam gtan gyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams ni bsam gtan gyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The concentrations are empty of the nature of the concentrations.

original: tshad med pa rnams ni tshad med pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams ni tshad med pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The immeasurables are empty of the nature of the immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The formless absorptions are empty of the nature of the formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams ni rnam par thar pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams ni rnam par thar pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The deliverances are empty of the nature of the deliverances.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The successive stages of meditative absorption are empty of the nature of the successive stages of meditative absorption.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness that are gateways to liberation are empty of the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness that are gateways to liberation.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The superknowledges are empty of the nature of the superknowledges.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo; ;gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo; ;gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The meditative stabilities are empty of the nature of the meditative stabilities. The dhāraṇī gateways are empty of the nature of the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The powers of the tathāgatas are empty of the nature of the powers of the tathāgatas.

original: @59b mi 'jigs pa rnams ni mi 'jigs pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: @59b mi 'jigs pa rnams ni mi 'jigs pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The fearlessnesses are empty of the nature of the fearlessnesses.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni so so yang dag par rig pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni so so yang dag par rig pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The detailed and thorough knowledges are empty of the nature of the detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: byams pa chen po ni byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: byams pa chen po ni byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: great love is empty of the nature of great love,

original: snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: great compassion is empty of the nature of great compassion,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas are empty of the nature of the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: the result of stream enterer is empty of the nature of the result of stream enterer,

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: the result of once-returner is empty of the nature of the result of once-returner,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: the result of non-returner is empty of the nature of the result of non-returner,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: the state of a worthy one is empty of the nature of a worthy one,

original: rang byang chub ni byang chub kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rang byang chub ni byang chub kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: and a pratyekabuddha’s awakening is empty of the nature of a pratyekabuddha’s awakening.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
translated: The knowledge of path aspects is empty of the knowledge of path aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //🔽de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is empty of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: Then venerable Subhūti said to venerable Śāriputra,🔽“Venerable Śāriputra, it is so!

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rnam grangs des na /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, it is so!

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar dka' ba ste /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar dka' ba ste /
translated: For that reason, it is hard to fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: @60a *// de ni 'di ltar nam mkha' ni 'di snyam du bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so /
analyzed: @60a *// de ni 'di ltar nam mkha' ni 'di snyam du bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so /
translated: it is because space does not think, ‘I will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.’

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Venerable Subhūti,

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang 'di snyam du bdag gis /
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang 'di snyam du bdag gis /
translated: in the same way, the bodhisattva mahāsattva does not think,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so //
translated: ‘I will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.’

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i phyir te /
translated: It is because all phenomena are equal to space.

original: 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bur mos nas /
analyzed: 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bur mos nas /
translated: However, the bodhisattva mahāsattva, having confidence that all phenomena are like space,🔽fully awakens to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o; ;gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bur mos par byed kyang /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o; ;gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bur mos par byed kyang /
translated: If the bodhisattva mahāsattva has confidence that all phenomena are like space,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar sla ste /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar sla ste /
translated: it is easy for him to fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar dka' ba med na ni /
analyzed: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar dka' ba med na ni /
translated: If it were not difficult to fully awaken to buddhahood,

original: byang chub sems dpa' gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: then bodhisattvas as numerous as the grains of sand in the Ganges River would not turn away from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Venerable Subhūti,

original: rnam grangs des na /🔽bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par @60b rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ni dka' ba ste /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par @60b rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ni dka' ba ste /
translated: through this one of many explanations🔽I know that it is difficult to fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

original: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar sla ba ma yin par shes so //
analyzed: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar sla ba ma yin par shes so //
translated: that it is not easy to fully awaken to buddhahood.

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /

analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /

analyzed: de ji snyam du sems gzugs bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam /

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /

original: de ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de ni ma yin no //

analyzed: smras pa / 'o na ci tshor ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam /

translated: Is the suchness of the emptiness of the uncompounded turned away from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?🔽Is the suchness of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes turned away from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam /
translated: Is the suchness of the emptiness of no beginning and no end turned away from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?

translated: Is the suchness of the emptiness of non-rejection turned away from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?🔽Is the suchness of the emptiness of nature turned away from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?🔽Is the suchness of the emptiness of all phenomena turned away from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam /
translated: Is the suchness of the emptiness of defining characteristics turned away from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam; dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs🔽pa'i byang chub las ldog gam /

translated: Is the suchness of the emptiness of nonthings turned away from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?

analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam /

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /

analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /

translated: Would the suchness of the applications of mindfulness turn back from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?

analyzed: dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam /

analyzed: stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam; byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog
translated: Does the suchness of the branches of awakening turn away from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?

analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam /
translated: Does the suchness of the noble truths turn away from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?

analyzed: bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam /🔽tshad med pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang @81a *//
translated: Does the suchness of the concentrations turn away from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?🔽Does the suchness of the immeasurables turn away from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?

analyzed: yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam /
translated: Would the suchness of the meditative stabilities of emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness turn back from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?

analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam /

analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam /

analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam /

analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam /

translated: Would the suchness of the detailed and thorough knowledges turn away from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?🔽Would the suchness of great love turn away from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?

translated: Would the suchness of the result of non-returner turn back from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?🔽Would the suchness of the state of a worthy one turn back from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na @82a *//

analyzed: med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam /
translated: “Do you think that the nonexistence of form, the nonexistence of feeling, the nonexistence of perception, the nonexistence of volitional factors, and the nonexistence of consciousness turn back from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?”

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /

translated: they do not.”🔽Subhūti asked,

translated: “Venerable Śāriputra, what do you think,🔽is that dharma that turns back from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening to be found apart from the suchness of form?🔽Is that dharma that turns back from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening to be found apart from the suchness of feeling?

original: 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam /
analyzed: 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam /
translated: Is that dharma that turns back from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening to be found apart from the suchness of perception?

analyzed: 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam /

analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam /
translated: Is there any such dharma that would turn away from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening other than the suchness of consciousness?

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /

analyzed: de ji snyam du sems /

analyzed: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu yod dam /
