translated: “Venerable Śāradvatī­putra,

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyis bye brag med par rab tu phye ba la /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyis bye brag med par rab tu phye ba la /
translated: In this way, the bodhisattva mahāsattva, who is distinguished by the suchness of all phenomena, which is without distinction,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'jum zhing 'god pa med la yid la 'gyod pa med na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'jum zhing 'god pa med la yid la 'gyod pa med na /
translated: if the bodhisattva mahāsattva’s mind is not cowed, is not discouraged, and has no regrets,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: then that bodhisattva mahāsattva will emerge to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.”

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa /
translated: Then the Lord said to the venerable Subhūti,

original: rab 'byor / legs so /
analyzed: rab 'byor / legs so /
translated: “Subhūti, excellent, excellent!

original: legs so // 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi phyir; khyod kyis tshig brjod pa legs par spobs so //
analyzed: legs so // 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi phyir; khyod kyis tshig brjod pa legs par spobs so //
translated: In this way, through the power of the Buddha, you have eloquently expressed the words for the sake of the bodhisattva mahāsattvas.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyis bye brag med par rab tu phye ba la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyis bye brag med par rab tu phye ba la /
translated: Subhūti, in this way, the bodhisattva great beings, through the suchness of all phenomena, are distinguished as being without distinctions.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'jum zhing 'gong ba med la yid la 'gyod pa med cing /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'jum zhing 'gong ba med la yid la 'gyod pa med cing /
translated: The minds of the bodhisattva great beings do not become downcast, do not become discouraged, and do not become regretful.

original: mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur na /
translated: They are not frightened, terrified, or become filled with dread.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The bodhisattva great beings will emerge in unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.”

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽de lta bu'i @91a *//
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / de lta bu'i @91a *//
translated: “Blessed One,🔽the bodhisattva great beings who have such qualities

original: chos dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub gang gis 'byung bar 'gyur /
analyzed: chos dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub gang gis 'byung bar 'gyur /
translated: will emerge in what kind of awakening?”🔽The Blessed One said,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; rab 'byor /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; rab 'byor /
translated: “Subhūti,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'byung bar 'gyur /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'byung bar 'gyur /
translated: It is through unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening that the bodhisattva great being will emerge.

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: bcom ldan 'das; 'byung bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la ji ltar gnas par bgyi /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das; 'byung bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la ji ltar gnas par bgyi /
translated: “Blessed One, how should a bodhisattva great being who wants to emerge stand in unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: ” The Blessed One said,

original: sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid du gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid du gnas par bya'o //
translated: “They should stand in sameness of mind toward all sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems bskyed par bya ste /
analyzed: sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems bskyed par bya ste /
translated: They should arouse a mind of sameness toward all sentient beings.

original: mi mnyam pa'i sems bskyed par mi bya'o //
analyzed: mi mnyam pa'i sems bskyed par mi bya'o //
translated: They should not arouse an unshared mind.

original: sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems kyis dmigs par bya ste /
analyzed: sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems kyis dmigs par bya ste /
translated: They should observe all sentient beings with a mind of sameness.

original: mi mnyam pa'i sems kyis dmigs par mi bya'o //
analyzed: mi mnyam pa'i sems kyis dmigs par mi bya'o //
translated: They should not observe with an unshared mind.

original: sems can thams cad la byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad la byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po bskyed par bya'o //
translated: They should arouse great love and great compassion toward all sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems kyis dmigs par bya ste /
analyzed: sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems kyis dmigs par bya ste /
translated: One should focus on all sentient beings with a mind of love.

original: brlang ba'i sems kyis dmigs par mi bya'o; ;sems can thams cad la nga rgyal med par bya'o //
analyzed: brlang ba'i sems kyis dmigs par mi bya'o; ;sems can thams cad la nga rgyal med par bya'o //
translated: One should not focus on them with a mind of violence.

original: sems can thams cad la g-yo med par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad la g-yo med par bya'o //
translated: One should be free of pride toward all sentient beings.🔽One should be free of deceit toward all sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad la phan pa'i sems bskyed par bya ste /
analyzed: sems can thams cad la phan pa'i sems bskyed par bya ste /
translated: One should generate a mind of benefit toward all sentient beings.

original: @91b gnod pa'i sems bskyed par mi bya'o //
analyzed: @91b gnod pa'i sems bskyed par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not generate a mind of harm.

original: sems can thams cad la phan pa'i sems kyis dmigs par bya ste /
analyzed: sems can thams cad la phan pa'i sems kyis dmigs par bya ste /
translated: One should focus on all sentient beings with a mind of benefit.

original: gnod pa'i sems kyis dmigs par mi bya'o //
analyzed: gnod pa'i sems kyis dmigs par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not focus on them with a mind of harm.

original: sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i sems bskyed par bya ste /
analyzed: sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i sems bskyed par bya ste /
translated: One should generate a mind free of anger toward all sentient beings.

original: khong khro ba'i sems mi bskyed do //🔽sems can thams cad la mi 'tshe ba'i sems bskyed par bya ste /
analyzed: khong khro ba'i sems mi bskyed do // sems can thams cad la mi 'tshe ba'i sems bskyed par bya ste /
translated: One should not generate a mind of anger.🔽One should generate a mind free of violence toward all sentient beings.🔽One should not generate a mind of violence.

original: 'tshe ba'i sems mi bskyed do; ;sems can thams cad la mi 'tshe ba'i sems kyis dmigs par bya ste /
analyzed: 'tshe ba'i sems mi bskyed do; ;sems can thams cad la mi 'tshe ba'i sems kyis dmigs par bya ste /
translated: One should focus on all sentient beings with a mind free of violence.

original: 'tshe ba'i sems kyis dmigs par mi bya'o //
analyzed: 'tshe ba'i sems kyis dmigs par mi bya'o //
translated: He should not focus on thoughts of violence.

original: sems can thams cad la ma'i sems dang / pha'i sems dang / phu nu'i sems dang / sring mo'i sems dang / grogs po dang / gnyen pa dang / rus gcig pa'i sems bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad la ma'i sems dang / pha'i sems dang / phu nu'i sems dang / sring mo'i sems dang / grogs po dang / gnyen pa dang / rus gcig pa'i sems bskyed par bya'o //
translated: He should arouse thoughts of mother, father, brother, sister, friend, relative, and kinsman toward all sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad la ma dang / pha'i sems dang / phu nu dang / sring mo'i sems dang / grogs po dang / gnyen pa dang / rus gcig pa'i sems kyis dmigs par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad la ma dang / pha'i sems dang / phu nu dang / sring mo'i sems dang / grogs po dang / gnyen pa dang / rus gcig pa'i sems kyis dmigs par bya'o //
translated: He should focus on all sentient beings with thoughts of mother, father, brother, sister, friend, relative, and kinsman.

original: bdag gis kyang srog gcod pa spang bar bya; gzhan yang srog gcod pa spang ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang srog gcod pa spang bar bya; gzhan yang srog gcod pa spang ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: “ ‘I myself should give up killing; I should encourage others to give up killing;

original: srog gcod pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: srog gcod pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: I should speak in praise of giving up killing;

original: gzhan gang gis srog gcod pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gang gis srog gcod pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: I should speak in praise of others giving up killing as well, welcoming it.

original: bdag gis kyang ma byin par len pa spang bar bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang ma byin par len pa spang bar bya /
translated: “ ‘I myself should give up stealing;

original: gzhan yang ma byin par len pa spang ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang ma byin par len pa spang ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: “ ‘One should encourage others to give up stealing.

original: @92a *// ma byin par len pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: @92a *// ma byin par len pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: One should speak in praise of giving up stealing.

original: gzhan gang gis ma byin par len pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gang gis ma byin par len pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: One should rejoice in those who give up stealing.

original: bdag gis kyang 'dod pas log par g-yem pa spang bar bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang 'dod pas log par g-yem pa spang bar bya /
translated: “ ‘One should give up sexual misconduct.

original: gzhan yang 'dod pas log par g-yem pa spang ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya /🔽'dod pas log par g-yem pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'dod pas log par g-yem pa spang ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya / 'dod pas log par g-yem pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: One should encourage others to give up sexual misconduct.🔽One should speak in praise of giving up sexual misconduct.

original: gzhan gang gis 'dod pas log par g-yem pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gang gis 'dod pas log par g-yem pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: One should rejoice in those who give up sexual misconduct.

original: bdag gis kyang brdzun du smra ba spang bar bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang brdzun du smra ba spang bar bya /
translated: “ ‘One should give up lying.

original: gzhan yang brdzun du smra ba spang ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang brdzun du smra ba spang ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: One should encourage others to give up lying.

original: brdzun du smra ba spong ba'i legs pa brjod par bya; gzhan gang gis brdzun du smra ba spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: brdzun du smra ba spong ba'i legs pa brjod par bya; gzhan gang gis brdzun du smra ba spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: I will speak in praise of giving up lying, and I will rejoice in the praise spoken by others.

original: bdag gis kyang phra ma spang bar bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang phra ma spang bar bya /
translated: I will give up slander,

original: gzhan yang phra ma spang ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya /🔽phra ma spong ba'i legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang phra ma spang ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya / phra ma spong ba'i legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: I will encourage others to give up slander,

original: gzhan gang gis phra ma spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gang gis phra ma spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: I will speak in praise of giving up slander, and I will rejoice in the praise spoken by others.

original: bdag gis kyang zhe gcod pa spong bar bya /🔽gzhan yang zhe gcod pa spong ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya /🔽zhe gcod pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang zhe gcod pa spong bar bya / gzhan yang zhe gcod pa spong ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya / zhe gcod pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: I will give up harsh words,🔽I will encourage others to give up harsh words,

original: gzhan gang gis zhe gcod @92b pa spangs pa de dag gis legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gang gis zhe gcod @92b pa spangs pa de dag gis legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: I will speak in praise of giving up harsh words, and I will rejoice in the praise spoken by others.

original: bdag gis kyang tshig bkyal ba spang bar bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang tshig bkyal ba spang bar bya /
translated: I will give up idle chatter,

original: gzhan yang tshig bkyal ba spang ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang tshig bkyal ba spang ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: “They should encourage others to give up idle chitchat,

original: tshig bkyal ba spong ba'i legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: tshig bkyal ba spong ba'i legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: praise the giving up of idle chitchat,

original: gzhan gang gis tshig bkyal ba spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gang gis tshig bkyal ba spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: and rejoice in the giving up of idle chitchat by others.

original: bdag gis kyang chags sems spang bar bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang chags sems spang bar bya /
translated: “They themselves should give up covetousness,

original: gzhan yang chags sems spang ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang chags sems spang ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: encourage others to give up covetousness,

original: chags sems spong ba'i legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: chags sems spong ba'i legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: praise the giving up of covetousness,

original: gzhan gang gis chags sems spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gang gis chags sems spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: and rejoice in the giving up of covetousness by others.

original: bdag gis kyang gnod sems spang bar bya /🔽gzhan yang gnod sems spang ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya; gnod sems spong ba'i legs pa brjod par bya //
analyzed: bdag gis kyang gnod sems spang bar bya / gzhan yang gnod sems spang ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya; gnod sems spong ba'i legs pa brjod par bya //
translated: “They themselves should give up malice,🔽encourage others to give up malice,🔽praise the giving up of malice,

original: gzhan gang gis gnod sems spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gang gis gnod sems spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: and rejoice in the giving up of malice by others.

original: bdag gis kyang log par lta ba spang bar bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang log par lta ba spang bar bya /
translated: I myself should abandon wrong views,

original: gzhan yang log par lta ba spang ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang log par lta ba spang ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: I should encourage others to abandon wrong views,

original: log par lta ba spong ba'i legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: log par lta ba spong ba'i legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: I should speak in praise of the abandonment of wrong views,

original: gzhan gang gis log par lta ba spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya ste /🔽de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub @93a *//
analyzed: gzhan gang gis log par lta ba spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya ste / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub @93a *//
translated: and I should speak in praise of others abandoning wrong views as well, welcoming it.

original: tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par bya'o //
translated: In that way, Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings who want to fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening should stand in the perfection of wisdom by way of not taking anything as a basis.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos /
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings

original: bdag gis kyang bsam gtan dang po la mnyam par bzhag par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang bsam gtan dang po la mnyam par bzhag par bya /
translated: should themselves become absorbed in the first concentration,

original: gzhan yang bsam gtan dang po la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang bsam gtan dang po la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: they should encourage others to become absorbed in the first concentration,

original: bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa'i legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa'i legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: I will speak in praise of the attainment of the first concentration.

analyzed: gzhan gang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o; ;bdag gis kyang bsam gtan gnyis pa la mnyam par gzhag par bya /
translated: I will speak in praise of those who attain the first concentration, welcoming it.

analyzed: gzhan yang bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya / bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: I will attain the second concentration.🔽I will speak in praise of the attainment of the second concentration.

original: gzhan gang bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o; ;bdag gis kyang bsam gtan gsum pa la mnyam par gzhag par bya /
analyzed: gzhan gang bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o; ;bdag gis kyang bsam gtan gsum pa la mnyam par gzhag par bya /
translated: I will speak in praise of those who attain the second concentration, welcoming it.

original: gzhan yang bsam gtang gsum pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang bsam gtang gsum pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: I will attain the third concentration.

original: bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: I will speak in praise of the attainment of the third concentration.

original: gzhan gang bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gang bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: I will speak in praise of those who enter the third meditative concentration, and I will also support them in every way.

original: @93b bdag gis kyang bsam gtan bzhi pa la mnyam par gzhag pa bya /🔽gzhan yang bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: @93b bdag gis kyang bsam gtan bzhi pa la mnyam par gzhag pa bya / gzhan yang bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: I will enter the fourth meditative concentration.

original: bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: I will speak in praise of the fourth meditative concentration, and I will also support those who enter the fourth meditative concentration.

original: gzhan gang bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya ste /
analyzed: gzhan gang bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya ste /
translated: I will speak in praise of those who enter the fourth meditative concentration, and I will also support them in every way.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par bya'o //🔽bdag gis kyang byams pa la mnyam par gzhag par bya /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par bya'o // bdag gis kyang byams pa la mnyam par gzhag par bya /
translated: In this way, bodhisattva great beings who wish to fully awaken to unsurpassed and perfect buddhahood should abide in this without apprehending anything.🔽I will enter loving kindness.

original: gzhan yang byams pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang byams pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: I will speak in praise of loving kindness, and I will also support those who enter loving kindness.

original: byams pa'i legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: byams pa'i legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: I will speak in praise of love.

original: gzhan gang byams pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dka' bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gang byams pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dka' bar bya'o //
translated: I will speak in praise of those who enter into the meditative absorption of love, and I will rejoice in it.

original: bdag gis kyang snying rje la mnyam par gzhag par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang snying rje la mnyam par gzhag par bya /
translated: I will enter into the meditative absorption of compassion.

original: gzhan yang snying rje la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang snying rje la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: I will encourage others to enter into the meditative absorption of compassion.

original: snying rje'i legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: snying rje'i legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: I will speak in praise of compassion.

original: gzhan gang snying rje la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gang snying rje la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: I will speak in praise of those who enter into the meditative absorption of compassion, and I will rejoice in it.

original: bdag gis kyang dga' ba la mnyam par bzhag par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang dga' ba la mnyam par bzhag par bya /
translated: I will enter into the meditative absorption of joy.

original: gzhan yang dga' ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang dga' ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: I will encourage others to enter into the meditative absorption of joy.

original: dga' ba'i legs pa brjod par bya /🔽gzhan gang dga' ba la snyoms par 'jug @94a *//
analyzed: dga' ba'i legs pa brjod par bya / gzhan gang dga' ba la snyoms par 'jug @94a *//
translated: I will speak in praise of joy.

original: pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: I will speak in praise of those who enter into the meditative absorption of joy, and I will rejoice in it.

original: bdag gis kyang btang snyoms la mnyam par gzhag par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang btang snyoms la mnyam par gzhag par bya /
translated: I will enter into the meditative absorption of equanimity.

original: gzhan yang btang snyoms la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang btang snyoms la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: One should also exhort others to equanimity,

original: btang snyoms kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: btang snyoms kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: praise the excellence of equanimity,

original: gzhan gang btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gang btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: and rejoice in the equanimity of others.

original: bdag gis kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhag par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhag par bya /
translated: One should also enter the formless meditative absorptions,

original: gzhan yang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: exhort others to the formless meditative absorptions,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: praise the excellence of the formless meditative absorptions,

original: gzhan gang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: and rejoice in the formless meditative absorptions of others.

original: bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya /
translated: One should also perfect the perfection of generosity,

original: gzhan yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: exhort others to the perfection of generosity,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: I will praise the perfection of generosity.

original: sems can gzhan gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: I will praise the perfection of generosity of those other sentient beings who are perfecting the perfection of generosity, and I will rejoice in it.

original: bdag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya /
translated: I will perfect the perfection of moral discipline.

original: gzhan yang @94b tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang @94b tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: I will encourage others to be intent on the perfection of moral discipline.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: I will praise the perfection of moral discipline.

original: sems can gzhan gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: I will praise the perfection of moral discipline of those other sentient beings who are perfecting the perfection of moral discipline, and I will rejoice in it.

original: bdag gis kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya /
translated: I will perfect the perfection of patience.

original: gzhan yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: I will encourage others to be intent on the perfection of patience.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: I will praise the perfection of patience.

original: sems can gzhan gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: I will praise the efforts of others who perfect the perfection of patience, and I will rejoice in their efforts.

original: bdag gis kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya /
translated: I will perfect the perfection of diligence.

original: gzhan yang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: I will encourage others to perfect the perfection of diligence.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: I will praise the perfection of diligence.

original: sems can gzhan gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: I will praise the efforts of others who perfect the perfection of diligence, and I will rejoice in their efforts.

original: bdag gis kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya /
translated: I will perfect the perfection of concentration.

original: gzhan yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: I will encourage others to perfect the perfection of concentration.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i legs pa brjod par bya /🔽sems can gzhan @95a *//
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i legs pa brjod par bya / sems can gzhan @95a *//
translated: I will praise the perfection of meditation.

original: gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: I will praise the perfection of meditation in others and will rejoice in it.

original: bdag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya /
translated: I will perfect the perfection of wisdom.

original: gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: I will encourage others to perfect the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: I will praise the perfection of wisdom.

original: sems can gzhan gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag gi legs par brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya ste /
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag gi legs par brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya ste /
translated: I will praise the perfection of wisdom in others and will rejoice in it.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par bya'o //
translated: Thus, Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings who want to fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening should stand in those with the method of not apprehending anything.

original: bdag gis kyang nang stong pa nyid la mnyam par bzhag par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang nang stong pa nyid la mnyam par bzhag par bya /
translated: “I myself should stand in inner emptiness;

original: gzhan yang nang stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang nang stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: I should incite others to inner emptiness;🔽I should praise the praise of inner emptiness;

original: nang stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya; sems can gzhan gang nang stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs par brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya; sems can gzhan gang nang stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs par brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: I should be joyful and full of praise for those who stand in inner emptiness.

original: bdag gis kyang phyi stong pa nyid la mnyam par bzhag par bya /🔽gzhan yang phyi stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang phyi stong pa nyid la mnyam par bzhag par bya / gzhan yang phyi stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: “I myself should stand in outer emptiness;🔽I should incite others to outer emptiness;

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: I should praise the praise of outer emptiness;

original: sems can gzhan gang phyi stong pa nyid la snyoms @95b par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang phyi stong pa nyid la snyoms @95b par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: and to express the praise of those other sentient beings who enter into the meditative absorption on external emptiness, and to rejoice in it.

original: bdag gis kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid la mnyam par gzhag par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid la mnyam par gzhag par bya /
translated: “I myself should enter into the meditative absorption on the emptiness of external and internal phenomena.

original: gzhan yang phyi nang stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang phyi nang stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: I should encourage others to enter into the meditative absorption on the emptiness of external and internal phenomena.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: I should praise the meditative absorption on the emptiness of external and internal phenomena.

original: sems can gzhan gang phyi nang stong pa nyid la snyom par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang phyi nang stong pa nyid la snyom par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: I should rejoice in the meditative absorption on the emptiness of external and internal phenomena by those other sentient beings.

original: bdag gis kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mnyam par bzhag par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mnyam par bzhag par bya /
translated: “I myself should enter into the meditative absorption on the emptiness of emptiness.

original: gzhan yang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: I should encourage others to enter into the meditative absorption on the emptiness of emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: I should praise the meditative absorption on the emptiness of emptiness.

original: sems can gzhan gang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: They should praise those sentient beings who enter into the emptiness of emptiness, and they should rejoice in that.

original: bdag gis kyang chen po stong pa nyid la mnyam par bzhag par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang chen po stong pa nyid la mnyam par bzhag par bya /
translated: They themselves should rest in the meditative absorption of the great emptiness.

original: gzhan yang chen po stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang chen po stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: They should encourage others to rest in the meditative absorption of the great emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: They should praise the meditative absorption of the great emptiness.

original: sems can gzhan gang chen po stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang chen po stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: They should praise those sentient beings who enter into the great emptiness, and they should rejoice in that.

original: bdag gis kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid la mnyam par bzhag par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid la mnyam par bzhag par bya /
translated: They themselves should rest in the meditative absorption of the emptiness of ultimate reality.

original: gzhan yang don dam pa stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang don dam pa stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: They should encourage others to rest in the meditative absorption of the emptiness of ultimate reality.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: They should praise the meditative absorption of the emptiness of ultimate reality.

original: sems can gzhan gang don dam pa stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug @96a *//
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang don dam pa stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug @96a *//
translated: They should praise those sentient beings who enter into the emptiness of ultimate reality, and they should rejoice in that.

original: pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: and rejoice in their good qualities.

original: bdag gis kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mnyam par bzhag par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mnyam par bzhag par bya /
translated: “I too should rest in meditative equipoise in conditioned emptiness.

original: gzhan yang 'dus byas stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'dus byas stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: I should encourage others to rest in meditative equipoise in conditioned emptiness.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: I should praise the qualities of conditioned emptiness.

original: sems can gzhan gang 'dus byas stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang 'dus byas stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: I should rejoice in the conditioned emptiness of all sentient beings.

original: bdag gis kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mnyam par bzhag par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mnyam par bzhag par bya /
translated: “I too should rest in meditative equipoise in unconditioned emptiness.

original: gzhan yang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: I should encourage others to rest in meditative equipoise in unconditioned emptiness.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya /🔽sems can gzhan gang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya /🔽sems can gzhan gang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: I should praise the qualities of unconditioned emptiness.🔽I should rejoice in the unconditioned emptiness of all sentient beings.

original: bdag gis kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mnyam par bzhag par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mnyam par bzhag par bya /
translated: I will also rest in equipoise on the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: gzhan yang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: I will also encourage others to rest in equipoise on the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: I will also praise the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: sems can gzhan gang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: I will also rejoice in others resting in equipoise on the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: bdag gis kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la mnyam par gzhag par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la mnyam par gzhag par bya /
translated: I will also rest in equipoise on the emptiness of what is not rejected and does not arise.

original: gzhan yang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong @96b pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong @96b pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: I will also encourage others to rest in equipoise on the emptiness of what is not rejected and does not arise.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: I will also praise the emptiness of what is not rejected and does not arise.

original: sems can gzhan gang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: and to express the praise of those other sentient beings who are absorbed in the emptiness of no beginning or end, and to rejoice in it.

original: bdag gis kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la mnyam par gzhag par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la mnyam par gzhag par bya /
translated: “I must be absorbed in the emptiness of non-rejection.

original: gzhan yang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: I must encourage others to be absorbed in the emptiness of non-rejection.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: I must praise the emptiness of non-rejection.

original: sems can gzhan gang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: I must rejoice in the emptiness of non-rejection of other sentient beings.

original: bdag gis kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mnyam par gzhag par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mnyam par gzhag par bya /
translated: “I must be absorbed in the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽I must encourage others to be absorbed in the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: gzhan yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya; rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya; rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: I must praise the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: sems can gzhan gang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o; ;bdag gis kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mnyam par gzhag par bya /
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o; ;bdag gis kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mnyam par gzhag par bya /
translated: I will speak in praise of those who enter into the meditative absorption of the emptiness of inherent nature, and I will rejoice in them.

original: gzhan yang chos thams cad stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang chos thams cad stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: I will encourage others to enter into the meditative absorption of the emptiness of inherent nature.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya /🔽sems can gzhan gang chos thams cad stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya / sems can gzhan gang chos thams cad stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: I will speak in praise of the emptiness of inherent nature.🔽I will speak in praise of those who enter into the meditative absorption of the emptiness of inherent nature, and I will rejoice in them.🔽I will enter into the meditative absorption of the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: bdag @97a *// gis kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mnyam par gzhag par bya /
analyzed: bdag @97a *// gis kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mnyam par gzhag par bya /
translated: I will encourage others to enter into the meditative absorption of the emptiness of all phenomena.🔽I will speak in praise of the emptiness of all phenomena.🔽I will enter into the meditative absorption of the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: gzhan yang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: I will encourage others to enter into the meditative absorption of the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: I will speak in praise of the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: sems can gzhan gang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: and to express the praise of those other sentient beings who are absorbed in the emptiness of defining characteristics, and to rejoice in that.

original: bdag gis kyang mi dmigs pa stong ba nyid la mnyam par gzhag par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang mi dmigs pa stong ba nyid la mnyam par gzhag par bya /
translated: “I must be absorbed in the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: gzhan yang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: I must encourage others to be absorbed in the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: I must praise the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: sems can gzhan gang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: I must rejoice in those other sentient beings who are absorbed in the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: bdag gis kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la mnyam par gzhag par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la mnyam par gzhag par bya /
translated: “I must be absorbed in the emptiness of non-entities.

original: gzhan yang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: I must encourage others to be absorbed in the emptiness of non-entities.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: I must praise the emptiness of non-entities.

original: sems can gzhan gang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: They should praise those sentient beings who enter into the emptiness of non-existence and they should rejoice in them with appreciation.

original: bdag gis kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mnyam par gzhag par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mnyam par gzhag par bya /

original: gzhan yang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: They should encourage others to rest in the emptiness of own-being.

original: ngo bo nyid stong @97b pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong @97b pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: They should praise the emptiness of own-being.

original: sems can gzhan gang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: They should praise those sentient beings who enter into the emptiness of own-being and they should rejoice in them with appreciation.

analyzed: bdag gis kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mnyam par gzhag par bya /
