original: gzhan yang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: They should encourage others to rest in the emptiness of the own-being of non-existence.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: They should praise the emptiness of the own-being of non-existence.

original: sems can gzhan gang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: and to rejoice in those who enter into the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: bdag gis kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi bsgom par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi bsgom par bya /
translated: “I must cultivate the four establishments of mindfulness.

original: gzhan yang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la yang dag par bskul bar bya /🔽dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la yang dag par bskul bar bya / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: I must encourage others to cultivate the four establishments of mindfulness.🔽I must praise the four establishments of mindfulness.

original: sems can gzhan gang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: I must rejoice in those who cultivate the four establishments of mindfulness.

original: bdag gis kyang yang dag par spong ba bzhi bsgom par bya /🔽gzhan yang yang dag par spong ba bzhi la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang yang dag par spong ba bzhi bsgom par bya / gzhan yang yang dag par spong ba bzhi la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: “I must cultivate the four right efforts.🔽I must encourage others to cultivate the four right efforts.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: I must praise the four right efforts.

original: sems can gzhan gang yang dag par spong ba bzhi bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang yang dag par spong ba bzhi bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: I will praise those who meditate on the four right efforts, and I will rejoice in them.

original: bdag gis kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba bzhi bsgom @98a *//🔽par bya / gzhan yang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la yang dag par bskul bar bya /🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba bzhi bsgom @98a *// par bya / gzhan yang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la yang dag par bskul bar bya / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: I will meditate on the four legs of manifestation.🔽I will encourage others to meditate on the four legs of manifestation.🔽I will praise the praise of the four legs of manifestation.

original: sems can gzhan gang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: I will rejoice in those who meditate on the four legs of manifestation.

original: bdag gis kyang dbang po lnga bsgom par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang dbang po lnga bsgom par bya /
translated: I will meditate on the five powers.

original: gzhan yang dbang po lnga la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang dbang po lnga la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: I will encourage others to meditate on the five powers.

original: dbang po rnams kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: dbang po rnams kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: I will praise the praise of the five powers.

original: sems can gzhan gang dbang po lnga bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang dbang po lnga bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: I will rejoice in those who meditate on the five powers.

original: bdag gis kyang stobs lnga bsgom par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang stobs lnga bsgom par bya /
translated: I will cultivate the five strengths.

original: gzhan yang stobs lnga la yang dag par bskul bar bya /🔽stobs rnams kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang stobs lnga la yang dag par bskul bar bya / stobs rnams kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: I will encourage others to cultivate the five strengths.🔽I will praise the praiseworthy qualities of the five strengths.

original: sems can gzhan gang stobs lnga bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang stobs lnga bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: I will rejoice in the cultivation of the five strengths by all beings.

original: bdag gis kyang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun bsgom par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun bsgom par bya /
translated: I will cultivate the seven factors of awakening.

original: gzhan yang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la yang dag par bskul bar bya /🔽byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la yang dag par bskul bar bya / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: I will encourage others to cultivate the seven factors of awakening.🔽I will praise the praiseworthy qualities of the seven factors of awakening.

original: sems can gzhan gang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //🔽bdag gis kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par bya /
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o // bdag gis kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par bya /
translated: I will rejoice in the cultivation of the seven factors of awakening by all beings.🔽I will cultivate the noble eightfold path.

original: gzhan yang 'phags pa'i lam @98b yan lag brgyad pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'phags pa'i lam @98b yan lag brgyad pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: I will encourage others to cultivate the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: I will praise the noble eightfold path.

original: sems can gzhan gang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: I will praise those who cultivate the noble eightfold path, and I will please them by joining them.

original: bdag gis kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bsgom par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bsgom par bya /
translated: I will cultivate the four noble truths.

original: gzhan yang 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: I will encourage others to cultivate the four noble truths.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: I will praise the four noble truths.

original: sems can gzhan gang 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: I will praise those who cultivate the four noble truths, and I will please them by joining them.

original: bdag gis kyang bsam gtan bzhi bsgom par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang bsam gtan bzhi bsgom par bya /
translated: I will cultivate the four formless concentrations.

original: gzhan yang bsam gtan bzhi la yang dag par bskul bar bya /🔽bsam gtan rnams kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang bsam gtan bzhi la yang dag par bskul bar bya /🔽bsam gtan rnams kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: I will encourage others to cultivate the four formless concentrations.🔽I will praise the four formless concentrations.

original: sems can gzhan gang bsam gtan bzhi bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang bsam gtan bzhi bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: I will speak in praise of those who meditate on the four concentrations, and I will rejoice in them.

original: bdag gis kyang tshad med pa bzhi bsgom par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang tshad med pa bzhi bsgom par bya /
translated: I will meditate on the four immeasurables.

original: gzhan yang tshad med pa bzhi la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang tshad med pa bzhi la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: I will encourage others to meditate on the four immeasurables.

original: tshad med pa rnams kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: I will speak in praise of the four immeasurables.

original: sems can gzhan gang tshad med pa bzhi bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang tshad med pa bzhi bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: I will speak in praise of those who meditate on the four immeasurables, and I will rejoice in them.

original: bdag gis kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bsgom par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bsgom par bya /
translated: I will meditate on the four formless absorptions.

original: gzhan yang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par @99a *//🔽'jug pa bzhi la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par @99a *// 'jug pa bzhi la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: I will encourage others to meditate on the four formless absorptions.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: I will speak in praise of the four formless absorptions.

original: sems can gzhan gang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: They should praise those other sentient beings who meditate on the four formless meditative attainments, and they should rejoice in that merit.

original: bdag gis kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad bsgom par bya; gzhan yang rnam par thar pa brgyad la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad bsgom par bya; gzhan yang rnam par thar pa brgyad la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: “They themselves should meditate on the eight deliverances; they should encourage others to meditate on the eight deliverances;

original: rnam par thar pa rnams kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: they should praise the praiseworthy eight deliverances;

original: sems can gzhan gang rnam par thar pa brgyad bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang rnam par thar pa brgyad bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: and they should rejoice in the merit of others who meditate on the eight deliverances.

original: bdag gis kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsgom par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsgom par bya /
translated: “They themselves should meditate on the nine serial steps of meditative absorption;

original: gzhan yang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la yang dag par bskul bar bya /🔽mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la yang dag par bskul bar bya /🔽mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: they should encourage others to meditate on the nine serial steps of meditative absorption;🔽they should praise the praiseworthy nine serial steps of meditative absorption;

original: sems can gzhan gang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par dgu bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par dgu bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: and to speak in praise of the accomplishment of the nine serial absorptions by other sentient beings, welcoming it with rejoicing.

original: bdag gis kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bsgom par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bsgom par bya /
translated: “I must cultivate the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, and the wishlessness gate of liberation.

original: gzhan yang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la yang dag par bskul @99b bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la yang dag par bskul @99b bar bya /
translated: I must encourage others to enter the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, and the wishlessness gate of liberation.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: I must speak in praise of the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, and the wishlessness gate of liberation.

original: sems can gzhan gang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: I must speak in praise of the cultivation of the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, and the wishlessness gate of liberation by other sentient beings, welcoming it with rejoicing.

original: bdag gis kyang mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom par bya /
translated: “I must cultivate the superknowledges.

original: gzhan yang mngon par shes pa rnams la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang mngon par shes pa rnams la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: They should encourage others to attain the superknowledges.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: They should speak in praise of the superknowledges.

original: sems can gzhan gang mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: They should praise those who cultivate the superknowledges, rejoicing in them.

original: bdag gis kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom par bya /
translated: “They themselves should cultivate the meditative stabilizations.

original: gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin rnams la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin rnams la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: They should encourage others to cultivate the meditative stabilizations.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: They should speak in praise of the meditative stabilizations.

original: sems can gzhan gang ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: They should praise those who cultivate the meditative stabilizations, rejoicing in them.

original: bdag gis kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom par bya /
translated: “They themselves should cultivate the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: gzhan yang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: They should encourage others to cultivate the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: They should speak in praise of the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: sems can gzhan gang gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: I will praise the attainment of the dhāraṇī gateways by others and rejoice in it.

original: bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya /🔽gzhan yang @100a *//
analyzed: bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya / gzhan yang @100a *//
translated: I will perfect the ten powers of the tathāgatas.🔽I will encourage others to attain the ten powers of the tathāgatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la yang dag par bskul bar bya /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la yang dag par bskul bar bya / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: I will praise the ten powers of the tathāgatas.

original: sems can gzhan gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: I will praise the attainment of the ten powers of the tathāgatas by others and rejoice in it.

original: bdag gis kyang mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya /
translated: I will perfect the four fearlessnesses.

original: gzhan yang mi 'jigs pa bzhi la yang dag par bskul bar bya /🔽mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang mi 'jigs pa bzhi la yang dag par bskul bar bya /🔽mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: I will encourage others to attain the four fearlessnesses.🔽I will praise the four fearlessnesses.

original: sems can gzhan gang mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: They should praise those other sentient beings who are perfecting the four assurances, and they should rejoice in that.

original: bdag gis kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya /
translated: “They should themselves perfect the four kinds of exact knowledge.

original: gzhan yang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yang dag par bskul bar bya /🔽so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yang dag par bskul bar bya / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: They should encourage others to take up the four kinds of exact knowledge.🔽They should praise the four kinds of exact knowledge.

original: sems can gzhan gang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o /
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o /
translated: They should praise those other sentient beings who are perfecting the four kinds of exact knowledge, and they should rejoice in that.

original: bdag gis kyang byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya /
translated: “They should themselves perfect great love.

original: gzhan yang byams pa chen po la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang byams pa chen po la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: They should encourage others to take up great love.

original: byams pa chen po'i legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: byams pa chen po'i legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: They should praise great love.

original: sems can gzhan gang byams pa chen po @100b yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang byams pa chen po @100b yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: They should praise those other sentient beings who are perfecting great love, and they should rejoice in that.

original: bdag gis kyang snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya /
translated: “They themselves should perfect great compassion.

original: gzhan yang snying rje chen po la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang snying rje chen po la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: They should encourage others to have great compassion.

original: snying rje chen po'i legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: They should praise the perfection of great compassion.

original: sems can gzhan gang snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: They should praise those other sentient beings who are perfecting great compassion, and they should rejoice in that.

original: bdag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par bya /🔽gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par bya / gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: “They themselves should perfect the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.🔽They should encourage others to have the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: They should praise the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: sems can gzhan gang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: and to speak in praise of the perfection of the unshared qualities of the Buddhas by other sentient beings, and to rejoice in it.

original: bdag gis kyang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba lugs dang lugs ma yin pa la mnyam par bzhag par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba lugs dang lugs ma yin pa la mnyam par bzhag par bya /
translated: “I myself should be absorbed in the forward and reverse processes of dependent origination,

original: gzhan yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba lugs dang lugs ma yin pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba lugs dang lugs ma yin pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: and I should encourage others to be absorbed in the forward and reverse processes of dependent origination,

original: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: I should speak in praise of dependent origination,

original: sems can gzhan gang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya ste /
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya ste /
translated: and I should speak in praise of those other sentient beings who are absorbed in dependent origination, and I should rejoice in it.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med @101a *//
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med @101a *//
translated: In this way, Bodhisattva-Mahasattvas should practice the perfection of wisdom.

original: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par bya'o //
translated: “Those who wish to fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening should abide in that without apprehending anything.

original: bdag gis kyang sdug bsngal yongs su shes par bya /🔽kun 'byung ba rab tu spang bar bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang sdug bsngal yongs su shes par bya / kun 'byung ba rab tu spang bar bya /
translated: “I should fully understand suffering.🔽I should abandon its origin.

original: 'gog pa mngon du bya /
analyzed: 'gog pa mngon du bya /
translated: I should actualize its cessation.

original: lam bsgom par bya /
analyzed: lam bsgom par bya /
translated: I should cultivate the path.

original: gzhan yang sdug bsngal yongs su shes par bya ba dang / kun 'byung ba rab tu spang ba dang / 'gog pa mngon du bya ba dang / lam bsgom pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang sdug bsngal yongs su shes par bya ba dang / kun 'byung ba rab tu spang ba dang / 'gog pa mngon du bya ba dang / lam bsgom pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: I should encourage others to fully understand suffering, to abandon its origin, to actualize its cessation, and to cultivate the path.

original: sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba rab tu spong ba dang / 'gog pa mngon du byed pa dang / lam bsgom pa'i legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba rab tu spong ba dang / 'gog pa mngon du byed pa dang / lam bsgom pa'i legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: I should speak in praise of fully understanding suffering, abandoning its origin, actualizing its cessation, and cultivating the path.

original: sems can gzhan gang sdug bsngal yongs su shes par byed pa dang; kun 'byung ba rab tu spong ba dang / 'gog pa mngon du byed pa dang / lam bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //🔽bdag gis kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang sdug bsngal yongs su shes par byed pa dang; kun 'byung ba rab tu spong ba dang / 'gog pa mngon du byed pa dang / lam bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o // bdag gis kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir /
translated: They should speak in praise of the knowledge of the fruit of stream enterer, and of those sentient beings who are making it known, who are abandoning its origin, who are realizing its cessation, and who are cultivating its path.

original: shes pa bskyed de /
analyzed: shes pa bskyed de /
translated: “They should themselves generate the knowledge that actualizes the fruit of stream enterer.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du mi bya /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du mi bya /
translated: They should not actualize the very limit of reality.

original: gzhan yang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon du bya ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon du bya ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: They should encourage others to actualize the knowledge that is the fruit of stream enterer.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon du bya ba'i legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon du bya ba'i legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: They should speak in praise of the knowledge that is the fruit of stream enterer.

original: sems can gzhan gang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon @101b du byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon @101b du byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: They should speak in praise of those sentient beings who are actualizing the knowledge that is the fruit of stream enterer, rejoicing in them with a sympathetic joy.

original: bdag gis kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir shes pa bskyed de /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir shes pa bskyed de /
translated: “They themselves should generate the knowledge that realizes the result of once-returner,

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du mi bya /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du mi bya /
translated: but they should not actualize the very limit of reality.

original: gzhan yang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon du bya ba la yang dag par bskul par bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon du bya ba la yang dag par bskul par bya /
translated: They should encourage others to realize the knowledge that is the result of once-returner,

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon du bya ba'i legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon du bya ba'i legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: and they should praise the realization of the knowledge that is the result of once-returner.

original: sems can gzhan gang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon du byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon du byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: They should rejoice in the realization of the knowledge that is the result of once-returner by other sentient beings.

original: bdag gis kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir shes pa bskyed de /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir shes pa bskyed de /
translated: “They themselves should generate the knowledge that realizes the result of non-returner,

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du mi bya /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du mi bya /
translated: but they should not actualize the very limit of reality.

original: gzhan yang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon du bya ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon du bya ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: They should encourage others to realize the knowledge that is the result of non-returner,🔽and they should praise the realization of the knowledge that is the result of non-returner.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon du bya ba'i legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon du bya ba'i legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: One should proclaim the praiseworthiness of manifesting the knowledge of the fruit of non-returning.

original: sems can gzhan gang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon du byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon du byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: One should rejoice in others manifesting the knowledge of the fruit of non-returning, and one should praise it.

original: bdag gis kyang dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir shes pa bskyed de /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir shes pa bskyed de /
translated: One should generate the knowledge for manifesting the fruit of arhatship.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du mi bya /🔽gzhan yang dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon du bya ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya /🔽dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon du bya ba'i legs pa brjod @102a *//
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du mi bya / gzhan yang dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon du bya ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon du bya ba'i legs pa brjod @102a *//
translated: One should not manifest the limit of reality.🔽One should exhort others to manifest the knowledge of the fruit of arhatship.🔽One should praise the manifestation of the knowledge of the fruit of arhatship.

original: par bya / sems can gzhan gang dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon du byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: par bya / sems can gzhan gang dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu shes pa mngon du byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: One should rejoice in others manifesting the knowledge of the fruit of arhatship.

original: bdag gis kyang rang byang chub shes pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir shes pa bskyed de /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang rang byang chub shes pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir shes pa bskyed de /
translated: I too should generate the knowledge that realizes individual enlightenment.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du mi bya /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du mi bya /
translated: I should not actualize the very limit of reality.

original: gzhan yang rang byang chub shes pa mngon du bya ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang rang byang chub shes pa mngon du bya ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: I should encourage others to realize the knowledge that realizes individual enlightenment.

original: rang byang chub shes pa mngon du bya ba'i legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: rang byang chub shes pa mngon du bya ba'i legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: I should praise the realization of the knowledge that realizes individual enlightenment.

original: sems can gzhan gang rang byang chub shes pa mngon du byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o ////
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang rang byang chub shes pa mngon du byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o ////
translated: I should rejoice in those other sentient beings who realize the knowledge that realizes individual enlightenment.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //🔽bam po nyis brgya so lnga pa //🔽bdag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug par bya /🔽gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa // bam po nyis brgya so lnga pa // bdag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug par bya / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: The Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines🔽I should enter into the faultlessness of the bodhisattvas.🔽I should encourage others to enter into the faultlessness of the bodhisattvas.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa'i legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa'i legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: I should praise the entry into the faultlessness of the bodhisattvas.

original: sems can gzhan gang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa de dag gi legs par brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya ste /
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa de dag gi legs par brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya ste /
translated: I will speak well of those other sentient beings who enter into the faultlessness of the bodhisattvas and will rejoice in them.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'byung bar 'dod pas /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'byung bar 'dod pas /
translated: In that way, a bodhisattva great being who wishes to emerge into unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening

original: de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par bya'o //🔽bdag gis kyang sems @102b can rnams yongs su smin par bya /
analyzed: de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par bya'o // bdag gis kyang sems @102b can rnams yongs su smin par bya /
translated: should abide in that without apprehending anything.🔽I will bring sentient beings to full maturity.

original: gzhan yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: I will encourage others to bring sentient beings to full maturity.

original: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: I will speak well of bringing sentient beings to full maturity.

original: sems can gzhan gang sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: I will rejoice in those other sentient beings who bring sentient beings to full maturity.

original: bdag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang bar bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang bar bya /
translated: I will purify a buddhafield.

original: gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: They should also encourage others to purify a buddhafield,

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba'i legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba'i legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: and they should praise the purification of a buddhafield.

original: sems can gzhan gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: They should also rejoice in the purification of a buddhafield by others.

original: bdag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa bskyed par bya; gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa bskyed pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa bskyed par bya; gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa bskyed pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: They should also encourage others to develop the higher knowledges of a bodhisattva,

original: mngon par shes pa bskyed pa'i legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa bskyed pa'i legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: and they should praise the development of the higher knowledges.

original: sems can gzhan gang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa bskyed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa bskyed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: They should also rejoice in the development of the higher knowledges of others.

original: bdag gis kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes bskyed par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes bskyed par bya /
translated: They should also encourage others to develop the knowledge of a knower of all aspects,🔽and they should praise the development of the knowledge of a knower of all aspects.

original: gzhan yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: They should also encourage others to attain the wisdom of omniscience.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: They should praise the wisdom of omniscience.

original: sems @103a *// can gzhan gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes bskyed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems @103a *// can gzhan gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes bskyed pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: They should rejoice in others who generate the wisdom of omniscience.

original: bdag gis kyang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar bya /
translated: They should also abandon all the latent afflictions.

original: gzhan yang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: They should encourage others to abandon all the latent afflictions.

original: bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang pa'i legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang pa'i legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: They should praise the abandonment of all the latent afflictions.

original: sems can gzhan gang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya ste /
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya ste /
translated: and also praise the abandonment of all afflictive emotions and habitual tendencies in other sentient beings, and rejoice in it.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'byung bar 'dod pas /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'byung bar 'dod pas /
translated: In this way, bodhisattva great beings who wish to attain unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening

original: de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par bya'o //
translated: should abide in that without apprehending anything.

original: bdag gis kyang tshe phun sum tshogs pa yongs su gzung bar bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang tshe phun sum tshogs pa yongs su gzung bar bya /
translated: “I must take up the perfection of life.

original: gzhan yang tshe phun sum tshogs pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang tshe phun sum tshogs pa la yang dag par bskul bar bya /
translated: I must encourage others to take up the perfection of life.

original: tshe phun sum tshogs pa'i legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: tshe phun sum tshogs pa'i legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: I must praise the perfection of life.

analyzed: sems can gzhan gang tshe phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya'o //
translated: I must rejoice in the perfection of life of others.

original: bdag gis kyang dam pa'i chos gnas pa yongs su gzung bar bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang dam pa'i chos gnas pa yongs su gzung bar bya /
translated: “I must take up the perfection of the true Dharma.

original: gzhan yang dam pa'i chos gnas pa yongs su gzung ba @103b la yang dag par bskul bar bya /🔽dam pa'i chos gnas pa yongs su gzung ba'i legs pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang dam pa'i chos gnas pa yongs su gzung ba @103b la yang dag par bskul bar bya / dam pa'i chos gnas pa yongs su gzung ba'i legs pa brjod par bya /
translated: Furthermore, you should encourage others to uphold the holy Dharma,🔽and you should praise the upholding of the holy Dharma.

original: sems can gzhan gang dam pa'i chos gnas pa yongs su 'dzin pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya ste /🔽rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'byung bar 'dod pas; de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang dam pa'i chos gnas pa yongs su 'dzin pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar bya ste / rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'byung bar 'dod pas; de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas par bya'o //
translated: They should praise and rejoice in those other sentient beings who are upholding the holy Dharma.🔽“Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings who want to set out for unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening should stand in those with the aspiration for the knowledge of path aspects, and they should stand in those with the aspiration for the knowledge of all aspects, but they should not settle down on them.🔽“Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings should train in the perfection of wisdom and skillful means like that, and they should stand in those with the aspiration for the knowledge of path aspects and they should stand in those with the aspiration for the knowledge of all aspects, but they should not settle down on them.🔽“Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings who want to set out for unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening should stand in those with the aspiration for the knowledge of path aspects, and they should stand in those with the aspiration for the knowledge of all aspects, but they should not settle down on them.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa la bslab par bya'o; ;de de ltar slob cing de de ltar gnas pas /🔽de'i gzugs sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //

translated: “Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings who want to set out for unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening should stand in those with the aspiration for the knowledge of path aspects, and they should stand in those with the aspiration for the knowledge of all aspects, but they should not settle down on them.🔽“Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings who want to set out for unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening should stand in those with the aspiration for the knowledge of path aspects, and they should stand in those with the aspiration for the knowledge of all aspects, but they should not settle down on them.🔽“Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings who want to set out for unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening should stand in those with the aspiration for the knowledge of path aspects, and they should stand in those with the aspiration for the knowledge of all aspects, but they should not settle down on them.🔽“Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings who want to set out for unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening should stand in those with the aspiration for the knowledge of path aspects, and they should stand in those with the aspiration for the knowledge of all aspects, but they should not settle down on them.

analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: The right efforts will be non-obscured.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //🔽dbang po rnams sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro // dbang po rnams sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: The legs of miraculous power will be non-obscured.🔽The faculties will be non-obscured.

original: stobs rnams sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stobs rnams sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: The powers will be non-obscured.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: The branches of enlightenment will be non-obscured.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: The noble eightfold path will be non-obscured.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: the four noble truths are non-obstructed,

original: bsam gtan rnams sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: the meditative stabilities are non-obstructed,

original: tshad med pa rnams sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: the unlimiteds are non-obstructed,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams @105b sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams @105b sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: the formless absorptions are non-obstructed,

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: the eight deliverances are non-obstructed,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: the nine serial absorptions are non-obstructed,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are doors to deliverance are non-obstructed,

original: mngon par shes pa rnams sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: the clairvoyances are non-obstructed,

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro; ;gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro; ;gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: the meditative stabilizations are non-obstructed, the dhāraṇī gateways are non-obstructed,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sgrib ba med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sgrib ba med par 'gyur ro //
translated: the powers of the tathāgatas are non-obstructed,

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: the fearlessnesses will be unobstructed;

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //🔽byams pa chen po sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro // byams pa chen po sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: the detailed and thorough knowledges will be unobstructed;🔽great love will be unobstructed;

original: snying rje chen po sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: snying rje chen po sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: great compassion will be unobstructed;

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: the distinct attributes of a buddha will be unobstructed;

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes pa sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes pa sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: the knowledge of the fruit of stream-winner will be unobstructed;

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //🔽phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro // phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: the knowledge of the fruit of once-returner will be unobstructed;🔽the knowledge of the fruit of non-returner will be unobstructed;

original: dgra bcom pa nyid shes pa sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid shes pa sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: the knowledge of the fruit of worthy one will be unobstructed;🔽the knowledge of pratyekabuddha will be unobstructed;

original: rang sangs rgyas shes pa sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro; ;byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas shes pa sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro; ;byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: entering into the maturity of a bodhisattva will be unobstructed;

original: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //🔽sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su @106a *//
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro // sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su @106a *//
translated: the ripening of sentient beings will be unobstructed;

original: dag par bya ba sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dag par bya ba sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: the purification of a buddhafield will be unobstructed;

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: the knowledge of a knower of all aspects will be unobstructed;

original: bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: the elimination of all afflictive emotions along with the instincts for them will be unobstructed;

original: tshe phun sum tshogs pa sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshe phun sum tshogs pa sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: the excellence of life will be unobstructed;

original: dam pa'i chos gnas pa sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dam pa'i chos gnas pa sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: the duration of the holy Dharma will be unobstructed.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des /
translated: It is because those bodhisattva great beings

original: sngon gyi mtha' nas kyang gzugs yongs su ma bzung /🔽tshor ba yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: sngon gyi mtha' nas kyang gzugs yongs su ma bzung / tshor ba yongs su ma bzung /
translated: have not appropriated form from the past,🔽have not appropriated feeling,

original: 'du shes yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: 'du shes yongs su ma bzung /
translated: have not appropriated perception,

original: 'du byed yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: 'du byed yongs su ma bzung /
translated: have not appropriated volitional factors,

original: rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung //
translated: have not appropriated consciousness,

original: mig yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: mig yongs su ma bzung /
translated: have not appropriated eyes,

original: rna ba yongs su ma bzung /🔽sna yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: rna ba yongs su ma bzung / sna yongs su ma bzung /
translated: He did not fully apprehend the ears,🔽he did not fully apprehend the nose,

original: lce yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: lce yongs su ma bzung /
translated: he did not fully apprehend the tongue,

original: lus yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: lus yongs su ma bzung /
translated: he did not fully apprehend the body,

original: yid yongs su ma bzung ngo //🔽gzugs yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: yid yongs su ma bzung ngo // gzugs yongs su ma bzung /
translated: and he did not fully apprehend the mind.🔽He did not fully apprehend sights,

original: sgra yongs su ma bzung /🔽dri yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: sgra yongs su ma bzung / dri yongs su ma bzung /
translated: he did not fully apprehend sounds,🔽he did not fully apprehend smells,

original: ro yongs su ma bzung /🔽reg yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: ro yongs su ma bzung / reg yongs su ma bzung /
translated: he did not fully apprehend tastes,🔽he did not fully apprehend tangibles,

original: chos yongs su ma bzung ngo //🔽mig gi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: chos yongs su ma bzung ngo // mig gi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung /
translated: and he did not fully apprehend mental phenomena.🔽He did not fully apprehend the eye consciousness,

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung /🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung / sna'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung /
translated: he did not fully apprehend the ear consciousness,🔽he did not fully apprehend the nose consciousness,

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung /
translated: he did not fully apprehend the tongue consciousness,

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung /
translated: he did not fully apprehend the body consciousness,

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ngo //🔽mig gi 'dus te @106b reg pa yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ngo // mig gi 'dus te @106b reg pa yongs su ma bzung /
translated: and he did not fully apprehend the mind consciousness.🔽He did not fully apprehend eye contact,🔽he did not fully apprehend ear contact,

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung /🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung /🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung /
translated: he did not fully apprehend nose contact,

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung /
translated: He did not appropriate the union of the tongue.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung /
translated: He did not appropriate the union of the body.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ngo //🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ngo // mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su ma bzung /
translated: He did not appropriate the union of the mind.🔽He did not appropriate the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of the eye.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su ma bzung /🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su ma bzung / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su ma bzung /
translated: He did not appropriate the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of the ear.🔽He did not appropriate the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of the nose.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su ma bzung /
translated: He did not appropriate the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of the tongue.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su ma bzung /
translated: He did not appropriate the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of the body.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ngo //🔽sa'i khams yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ngo // sa'i khams yongs su ma bzung /
translated: He did not appropriate the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of the mind.🔽He did not appropriate the earth element.

original: chu'i khams yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: chu'i khams yongs su ma bzung /
translated: He did not appropriate the water element.

original: me'i khams yongs su ma bzung /🔽rlung gi khams yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: me'i khams yongs su ma bzung / rlung gi khams yongs su ma bzung /
translated: He did not appropriate the fire element.🔽He did not appropriate the wind element.

original: nam mkha'i khams yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams yongs su ma bzung /
translated: He did not appropriate the space element.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams yongs su ma bzung ngo //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams yongs su ma bzung ngo //
translated: He did not fully grasp the element of consciousness.

original: ma rig pa yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: ma rig pa yongs su ma bzung /
translated: He did not fully grasp ignorance.

original: 'du byed yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: 'du byed yongs su ma bzung /
translated: He did not fully grasp volitional factors.

original: rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung /
translated: He did not fully grasp consciousness.

original: ming dang gzugs yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs yongs su ma bzung /
translated: He did not fully grasp name and form.

original: skye mched drug yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: skye mched drug yongs su ma bzung /
translated: He did not fully grasp the six sense spheres.

original: reg pa yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: reg pa yongs su ma bzung /
translated: He did not fully grasp contact.

original: tshor ba yongs su ma bzung /🔽sred pa yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: tshor ba yongs su ma bzung / sred pa yongs su ma bzung /
translated: He did not fully grasp feeling.🔽He did not fully grasp craving.

original: len pa yongs su ma bzung /🔽srid pa yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: len pa yongs su ma bzung / srid pa yongs su ma bzung /
translated: He did not fully grasp grasping.🔽He did not fully grasp existence.

original: skye ba yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: skye ba yongs su ma bzung /
translated: He did not fully grasp birth.

original: rga shi yongs su ma bzung ngo //🔽sbyin pa'i pha rol tu @107a *//
analyzed: rga shi yongs su ma bzung ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu @107a *//
translated: He did not fully grasp old age and death.

original: phyin pa yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: phyin pa yongs su ma bzung /
translated: He did not fully grasp the perfection of generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung /🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung /
translated: He did not fully grasp the perfection of moral discipline.🔽He did not fully grasp the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung //
translated: He did not fully grasp the perfection of perseverance.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung /
translated: He did not fully grasp the perfection of concentration.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung ngo //🔽nang stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung ngo // nang stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung /
translated: they do not take up the perfection of wisdom;🔽they do not take up inner emptiness,

original: phyi stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung /🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung / phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung /
translated: they do not take up outer emptiness,🔽they do not take up inner and outer emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung /🔽chen po stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung / chen po stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung /
translated: they do not take up the emptiness of emptiness,🔽they do not take up great emptiness,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung /🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung / 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung /
translated: they do not take up the emptiness of ultimate reality,🔽they do not take up the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung /🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung /
translated: they do not take up the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena,🔽they do not take up the emptiness of what is beyond extremes,

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung /🔽dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung /
translated: they do not take up the emptiness of beginning and end,🔽they do not take up the emptiness of nonrejection,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung /
translated: they do not take up the emptiness of inherent existence,

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung /
translated: they do not take up the emptiness of all phenomena,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung /🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung /
translated: He did not appropriate the emptiness of its own mark.🔽He did not appropriate the emptiness of nonapprehending.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung /🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung /
translated: He did not appropriate the emptiness of nonthings.🔽He did not appropriate the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ngo //🔽dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ngo // dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yongs su ma bzung /
translated: He did not appropriate the emptiness of the essential nature of nonthings.🔽He did not appropriate the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba @107b rnams yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba @107b rnams yongs su ma bzung /
translated: He did not appropriate the right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su ma bzung /🔽dbang po rnams yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su ma bzung / dbang po rnams yongs su ma bzung /
translated: He did not appropriate the legs of miraculous power.🔽He did not appropriate the faculties.

original: stobs rnams yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: stobs rnams yongs su ma bzung /
translated: He did not appropriate the powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su ma bzung /
translated: He did not appropriate the limbs of awakening.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su ma bzung ngo //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su ma bzung ngo //
translated: He did not appropriate the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su ma bzung /🔽bsam gtan rnams yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su ma bzung / bsam gtan rnams yongs su ma bzung /
translated: He did not appropriate the noble truths.🔽He did not appropriate the concentrations.

original: tshad med pa rnams yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams yongs su ma bzung /
translated: He did not appropriate the immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su ma bzung /
translated: He did not appropriate the formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams yongs su ma bzung /
translated: He did not appropriate the deliverances.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su ma bzung /
translated: He did not appropriate the successive absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su ma bzung ngo //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su ma bzung ngo //
translated: He did not appropriate the emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, or the wishless gate of liberation.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su ma bzung; ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su ma bzung; ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su ma bzung /
translated: He did not appropriate the clairvoyances, the meditative stabilizations,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su ma bzung ngo //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su ma bzung ngo //
translated: or the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su ma bzung /
translated: He did not appropriate the powers of the tathāgatas.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams yongs yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams yongs yongs su ma bzung /
translated: He did not appropriate the fearlessnesses.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su ma bzung /🔽byams pa chen po yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su ma bzung / byams pa chen po yongs su ma bzung /
translated: He did not appropriate the detailed and thorough knowledges.🔽He did not appropriate great love.

original: snying rje chen po yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: snying rje chen po yongs su ma bzung /
translated: He did not appropriate great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su ma bzung ngo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su ma bzung ngo //
translated: He did not appropriate the distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su ma bzung /
translated: they do not grasp the understanding of all phenomena;

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su ma bzung /
translated: they do not grasp the understanding of the aspects of the path;

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ngo //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ngo //
translated: and they do not grasp the understanding of all aspects.

original: @108a *// de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: @108a *// de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: 'di ltar gzugs yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar gzugs yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: it is because that which is not grasped as form

original: gzugs ma yin /
analyzed: gzugs ma yin /
translated: is not form.

original: tshor ba yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: tshor ba yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: That which is not grasped as feeling

original: tshor ba ma yin /
analyzed: tshor ba ma yin /
translated: is not feeling.

original: 'du shes yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: 'du shes yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: That which is not grasped as perception

original: 'du shes ma yin /
analyzed: 'du shes ma yin /
translated: is not perception.

original: 'du byed yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: 'du byed yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: That which is not grasped as formative predispositions

original: 'du byed ma yin /
analyzed: 'du byed ma yin /
translated: is not formative predispositions.

original: rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: That which is not grasped as consciousness

original: rnam par shes pa ma yin /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ma yin /
translated: is not consciousness.

original: mig yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: mig yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: That which is not grasped as the eyes

original: mig ma yin /
analyzed: mig ma yin /
translated: is not the eyes.

original: rna ba yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: rna ba yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: That which is not grasped as the ears

original: rna ba ma yin /
analyzed: rna ba ma yin /
translated: is not the ears.

original: sna yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /🔽sna ma yin /🔽lce yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: sna yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni / sna ma yin / lce yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: A nose that cannot be grasped does not exist.

original: lce ma yin /🔽lus yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: lce ma yin / lus yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: A tongue that cannot be grasped does not exist.

original: lus ma yin /🔽yid yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: lus ma yin / yid yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: A body that cannot be grasped does not exist.

original: yid ma yin /🔽gzugs yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: yid ma yin / gzugs yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: A mind that cannot be grasped does not exist.

original: gzugs ma yin /🔽sgra yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: gzugs ma yin / sgra yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: A form that cannot be grasped does not exist.

original: sgra ma yin /🔽dri yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /🔽dri ma yin /🔽ro yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: sgra ma yin / dri yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni / dri ma yin / ro yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: A sound that cannot be grasped does not exist.🔽A smell that cannot be grasped does not exist.

original: ro ma yin /🔽reg yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /🔽reg ma yin /
analyzed: ro ma yin / reg yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni / reg ma yin /
translated: A taste that cannot be grasped does not exist.🔽A feeling that cannot be grasped does not exist.

original: chos yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: chos yongs su gzung du med pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: A dharma that cannot be grasped does not exist.
